author: andschwa
body: This doesn't seem like something that can be automated, because we have no way of sending keys in CoreCLR, and it appears that this won't be the case anytime soon  https   github.com dotnet coreclr issues 1190.  Solution  either implement this ourselves, or pull in a NuGet package for test purposes     https   inputsimulator.codeplex.com    VSO create date - 11/11/2015 10:37:00     VSO closed date - 11/11/2015 11:34:00
title: AT: Read-Host
